entry.title: tkbctf4 is over
entry.content:
tkbctf4 has finished!

Here are the final TOP 10.

Ranking

Rank Name Point
1st 0x0 2541
2nd MMA 1987
3rd dcua 1870
4th superflip 1655
5th HackingForSushi 1461
6th nonbei 1200
7th tuat_mcc 1200
8th 竹田氏 1113
9th encrypti0x0n 806
10th CureSecure 800

Thank you for your interest in tkbctf4. We all enjoyed it. We hope you did, too.

Bye for now! Oh, and don’t forget to publish writeups!

entry.title: About IRC channel etc.
entry.content:
tkbctf3 will open at 12:00 JST today!

Here is the tkbctf3 irc channel: roddenberry.freenode.net #tkbctf3

We will make further announcements at score.tkbctf.info.

entry.title: Registration is now open!
entry.content:
Registration for tkbctf3 is now open!

  • (for team leaders) Team Registration
  • (for players) Sign up
    All players must be belonged to a team. (You can make a team with one person.)

If you find a bug on the registration system, create an issue or contact the developer on twitter.

Team registration ends at 2014/05/04 12:00 JST. tkbctf3 starts at 2014/05/04 12:00 JST and ends at 2014/05/05 06:00 JST.

tkbctf3 will be jeopardy style. We will make further announcement here.

entry.title: Website renewal!
entry.content:
We have renewed our website!

tkbctf3 details to be announced.

entry.title: tkbctf3!
entry.content:
tkbctf3やります！

5/4-5です。時間等は追って発表します。かみんぐすーん
